sentences.sContent: A tube cutter works best but you can use a hacksaw.
sentences.sContent_eng: A tube cutter works best but you can use a hacksaw.
sentences.sCn: 最好用截管器，不过用钢锯也能凑合。

sentences.sContent: I join in with the back quarter, separating the rear leg from the prized rib joints with a hacksaw.
sentences.sContent_eng: I join in with the back quarter, separating the rear leg from the prized rib joints with a hacksaw.
sentences.sCn: 我加入了处理后段的工作中，用钢锯从肋骨关节将后腿分离出来。

trans.tranCn: 钢锯；可锯金属的弓形锯
trans.tranOther: a cutting tool with small teeth on its blade, used especially for cutting metal
